derivation: or רָמַת נֶגֶב; from the plural or construct form of H7413 (רָמָה) and H5045 (נֶגֶב); heights (or height) of the South;
outline:
Ramoth= "heights"
  1. a place in Judah which received presents from David
    1. site dubious
kjv_def: south Ramoth, Ramath of the south.
strongs_def: Ramoth-Negeb or Ramath-Negeb, a place in Palestine
